page.title: 19CROP SPRAYERS:NORTH/ELTON
page.content: Apple Aviation-Proprietor Mr.Haughton. Established in 1983 to apply agro- chemicals, use 2 aircraft and employ 2 permanent staff and 4 seasonal workers. They work a 20- mile radius from the aerodrome. Chemicals are applied in liquid or granual form at a rate of 100 acres per hour. Spraying can not take place within 200 ft. of houses. Hormone chemicals are banned. A log of all flying is kept and inspected by The Civil Aviation Authority, Health & Safety Examiners and British Agric. Supply Inspection Service. Despite tightening controls on environment grounds and an increase in helicopter applications the firm hopes to increase its acreage in l986.
